quotes.quote: The creatures outside looked from pig to man, and from man to pig , and from pig to man again: but already it was impossible to say which was which.
Another world is not only possible, she is on her way. On a quiet day, I can hear her breathing
There is nothing to writing. All you have to do is sit down at a typewriter and bleed.
That's what careless words do, they make people love you a little less.
I wondered if that's how forgiveness budded, not with the fanfare of epiphany, but with pain gathering it's things, packing up, and slipping away unannounced in the middle of night .
The best books are those that tell you what you know already.
The way her body existed only where he touched her. The rest of her was smoke.
If you're happy in a dream, does that count?
This was the trouble with families. Like invidious doctors, they knew just where to hurt.
And the air was full of thoughts and words to say. But at times like these, only small things are ever said. Big things lurk unsaid inside.
There are things you can't do - like writing letters to a part of yourself. To your feet or hair. Or heart.
Existence is a series of footnotes to a vast obscure, unfinished masterpiece.
